text: @dcwoodruff How can states like a Texas open if they have increasing cases? AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — The number of coronavirus cases in Texas is approaching 19,000 and the number who have died is now at least 477, the Texas Department of State Health Services reported on Sunday. 700 since Sunday
